mapper.select:
SELECT
, site.site_name as siteName, area.area_name as areaName, building.building_name as buildingName, building.building_no as buildingName, room_typ.price as price, room_typ.room_type_name as roomTypeName FROM t_room room LEFT JOIN t_building building on room.building_id = building.id left join t_area area on building.area_id = area.id LEFT JOIN t_site site ON area.site_id = site.id LEFT JOIN t_room_type room_typ ON room.room_type = room_typ.id WHERE 1 = 1
and room.id = #{id}
and site.site_name LIKE concat('%', #{siteName}, '%')
and area.area_name LIKE concat('%', #{areaName}, '%')
and building.building_name LIKE concat('%', #{buildingName}, '%')
and room.room_name LIKE concat('%', #{roomName}, '%')
and room.user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY room.created_time DESC

SELECT
, site.site_name as siteName, area.area_name as areaName, building.building_name as buildingName, building.building_no as buildingName FROM t_room room LEFT JOIN t_building building on room.building_id = building.id left join t_area area on building.area_id = area.id LEFT JOIN t_site site ON area.site_id = site.id WHERE room.user_id is null
